#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int T,x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4,left,right,top,bottom,ans,intersection,area1,area2;
scanf("%d",&T);
while(T--)
{
scanf("%d%d%d%d",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
scanf("%d%d%d%d",&x3,&y3,&x4,&y4);
area1=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
area2=(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
left=max(x1,x3);
right=min(x2,x4);
top=max(y1,y3);
bottom=min(y2,y4);
if(left<=right&&top<=bottom)
{
intersection=(right-left)*(bottom-top);
ans=area1+area2-intersection;
//printf("ho");
}
else
{
ans=area1+area2;
}
printf("%d\n",ans);
}
return 0;
}
